data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Čučer Sandevo, North Macedonia know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Čučer Sandevo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Čučer Sandevo, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary: On average, 7 babies will be born in the next month to families who are far from God in Čučer Sandevo, North Macedonia.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, please raise up prophets in Čučer Sandevo who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Čučer Sandevo, North Macedonia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Albanian, Macedonian people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please give the people in the state of Čučer Sandevo access to a Bible in their own language.
Lord, to the people of Čučer Sandevo you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Čučer Sandevo.
